```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: web
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: web-server
  namespace: web
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: httpd
        image: httpd:2.4-alpine
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: web-server-service
  namespace: web
spec:
  selector:
    app: web
  ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 80
      targetPort: 80
  type: LoadBalancer
```

```
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: whoami-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: whoami
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: whoami
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: whoami-container
        image: containous/whoami
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: whoami-service
spec:
  ports:
  - name: http
    targetPort: 80
    port: 80
  selector:
    app: whoami
---
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: whoami-ingress
spec:
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - path: /whoami
        pathType: Exact
        backend:
          service:
            name: whoami-service
            port:
              number: 80
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: metallb-load-balancer
spec:
  selector:
    app: whoami
  ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 80
      targetPort: 80
  type: LoadBalancer
```
